title: Detective Frankenstein
description: Mystery is afoot in London. Thieves roam the graveyards, your best friend is missing, and your creepy boss is building something in his lab. A famous detective is on your side. But does he have secrets of his own. Every Twisted JourneysÂ® graphic novel lets YOU control the action by choosing which path to follow. Which twists and turns will your journey take?
author: Alaya Dawn Johnson
